definitions: the action of causing the destruction of a ship in order to steal the cargo

examples.text: the locals reverted to the age-old practice of wrecking

shortDefinitions: action of causing destruction of ship to steal cargo

definitions: the activity or business of breaking up badly damaged vehicles or demolishing old buildings to obtain usable spares or scrap

examples.text: his main business was wrecking and removal

shortDefinitions: activity of breaking up damaged vehicles to obtain spares
